name: Cute Things Dying Violently
description: Flick hapless Critters around to get them safely out of each level! Dodge all sorts of lethal goodies like spikes, buzzsaws, and fire, and use a variety of wacky items to pull it off.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista Processor: 1.7ghz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 512mb GPU DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 350 MB available space

reviews.review_text: It's so stupid, it's brilliant - beware changing screen resoultion though... help is available in the community guides if changing resolution to full scrren goes wrong, so don't give up - I didn't & I'm glad I didn't.
Clever little game. Nice, low cost purchase. I think with some more development, this could be a classic.
A bit much for someone who loves fluffy creatures but otherwise it's a great game.
AN interesting combo of angry birds and lemmings. Gameplay is ok but kindof mobile focused. Lacks the charm of other puzzle games and got bored pretty quickly.
